ReviewPages.application=Review Pages ReviewPages.generic.errormessage=Internal Server Error

ReviewPages.dialog.newReviewDateLabel=Date of next Review ReviewPages.dialog.submitReview=Set next review ReviewPages.dialog.cancel=Cancel ReviewPages.dialog.saveVersionSummary=Reviewed ReviewPages.dialog.confirmRemove=Do you really want to remove «{0}» from the review process?
# the add to review form ReviewPages.AddPage.title=Add Page to review process #ReviewPages.AddPage.space.label=Space ReviewPages.AddPage.page.label=Document ReviewPages.AddPage.nextReviewDate.label=First review date ##ReviewPages.AddPage.nextReviewDate.title=The Date before this page should be reviewed ReviewPages.AddPage.button.label=Add to Review ReviewPages.AddPage.page.error.empty=Document must not be empty ReviewPages.AddPage.page.error.missing=This document does not exist ReviewPages.AddPage.page.error.alreadyReviewed=This document is already under review ReviewPages.AddPage.nextReviewDate.error.empty=Date must not be empty ReviewPages.AddPage.nextReviewDate.error.format=Date format not supported ReviewPages.AddPage.saveVersionSummary=Added to Review
# messages from removing pages ReviewPages.RemovePage.page.error.alreadyRemoved=This document is not under review ReviewPages.RemovePage.saveVersionSummary=Removed from Review
